events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was categorized under Refund based on keywords related to requesting money back or returning items.
Customer support agent John Doe has been assigned to handle this refund request case.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’ll assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and start your refund?
Here is my order number 123456 and I attached a picture showing the wrong product that arrived instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and provide a prepaid shipping label for returning the wrong item.
That sounds great, I appreciate the quick response and look forward to resolving this issue smoothly.
The refund has been processed successfully, and you should see the amount credited back shortly. The return label was emailed to you as well.
We’re following up to ensure you received your refund and that everything has been resolved to your satisfaction.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
Please take a moment to complete our short satisfaction survey to let us know how we did with your refund request.
